biotools.summary: Web server which detects protein binding sites based on local structural alignments. Algorithms have been parallelized to allow for faster computing against the PDB. Pre-calculated protein similarity profiles for over 29,000 non-redundant proteins are also available.

bioschemas.name: ProBiS
bioschemas.summary: Web server which detects protein binding sites based on local structural alignments. Algorithms have been parallelized to allow for faster computing against the PDB. Pre-calculated protein similarity profiles for over 29,000 non-redundant proteins are also available.
